name.en: Seminar on Finance Theory and Applications Ⅱ

remark.ch: 不在分發優先順序內或名額外學生請拿密碼卡。

goal.en: Academic speech. This course helps Ph.D. students understand the contemporary research topics in theoretical and empirical finance.
goal.ch: 邀請學術界講座，使博士班同學了解最新的財務理論與實務議題。

content.en: We shall invite scholars home and abroad to talk about their current researches.
content.ch: 本課程邀請國內外學者發表其最新研究。

textbook.en: Electronic papers and presentation materials will be distributed before the classes.
textbook.ch: 本課程無教科書，講義於課前以電子郵件傳送給修課學生。
